summary:
Experienced Customer Sales Agent specialised in Sales , accounts Fulfilment and support  for Companies such FIVB, YOG, FIFA and IOC at Cygnific B.V since December 2003 (100% KLM daughter) with support in both English and French.
Previous job as restaurant manager and hotel Employee at the New World Hotel Saigon, a Marriott Management.

Specialties: Quality, Hard work, people management
